entries.journal_entry_description: A group of Trandoshan slavers have radioed in that they have been attacked by a large force of Wookiee resistance fighters. They have been boxed in by the resistance and are in desperate need of support. The leader of the slavers estimates they cannot hold out for much longer.
entries.task01_journal_entry_description: Meet the Trandoshan slavers at their last reported point.
entries.task02_journal_entry_description: After you have reached the place where the Trandoshan slavers are holding up, talk to Pressk, and find out what the situation is.
entries.task04_journal_entry_description: The third wave of Wookiee attackers have struck the Trandoshan slavers. Fight them off and protect the Trandoshan slavers.
entries.task07_journal_entry_description: The second wave of Wookiee attackers have struck the Trandoshan slavers. Fight them off and protect the Trandoshan slavers.
entries.task10_journal_entry_description: The first wave of Wookiee attackers have struck the Trandoshan slavers. Fight them off and protect the Trandoshan slavers.
entries.task12_journal_entry_description: Fight off the Wookiee attackers and rescue the slavers.
entries.task12_task_display_string_1: You successfully fought off the first wave.
entries.task12_task_display_string_2: You successfully fought off the second wave.
entries.task12_task_display_string_3: You successfully fought off the final wave.
entries.task13_journal_entry_description: It looks like you successfully managed to defeat the Wookiee resistance. Report back to the slaver leader.
entries.task13_journal_entry_title: Report Victory to the Slaver Leader
